Articles.Content:
Am I the only one who wants to put wheels 90 deegrees while being still functional?

I mean this:

They rotate, but have no grip in that position.

It's not anything making the game unplayable, but it would be cool to have that feature.

That would be cool. And while you're at it, give the rover wheels more traction and physics! Roving is really uncomfortable atm with slippery control and bouncing, and explosions...oh my, the explosions.
Reminds me the cars from the racing game POD. That would be pretty badass.

That would be cool. And while you're at it, give the rover wheels more traction and physics! Roving is really uncomfortable atm with slippery control and bouncing, and explosions...oh my, the explosions.

Yes, that too. They really bounce and slip a lot. Even the ones for low-grav enviroment. It seems like they all were tested only on Kerbin, because it's fun to drive stuff only there.
